video.title: One Tree Hill
video.synopsis: In this series, half-brothers Lucas and Nathan alternate between kinship and rivalry on the basketball court and in the hearts of their friends.

episodes.synopsis: Nathan challenges Lucas to a nighttime one-on-one basketball game. If Nathan wins, Lucas must not join the team; if Lucas wins, Nathan will quit.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: After failing in his first varsity basketball game, Lucas decides to quit the team.
episodes.title: The Places You Have Come to Fear the Most

episodes.synopsis: After a particularly spectacular basketball game, Lucas quickly supplants Nathan as the team's most popular player.
episodes.title: Are You True?

episodes.synopsis: Haley convinces Lucas to go with the team to a party at Nathan's beach house, hoping that the guys will become friendlier.
episodes.title: Crash into You

episodes.synopsis: Lucas asks Keith to play with him in the annual "Father and Son" basketball game.
episodes.title: All That You Can't Leave Behind

episodes.synopsis: When Whitey ejects Lucas and Nathan from the team bus due to their misconduct on the basketball court, they're stranded 30 miles from home.
episodes.title: Every Night Is Another Story

episodes.synopsis: The night of Dan and Deb's annual basketball appreciation party spurs old memories and new feelings.
episodes.title: Life in a Glass House

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to have fun, Brooke and Peyton attend a college party, but the situation gets bad when one of the guys drugs Peyton.
episodes.title: The Search for Something More

episodes.synopsis: After fighting with his father and Haley, Nathan succumbs to the pressure and takes amphetamines to help him play basketball better.
episodes.title: With Arms Outstretched

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Peyton try to redefine their friendship after Lucas chooses to be with her best friend, Brooke.
episodes.title: You Gotta Go There to Come Back

episodes.synopsis: Unable to cope with the pressure from Dan, Nathan quits the basketball team.
episodes.title: The Living Years

episodes.synopsis: After Peyton receives the news that her father is lost at sea, she and Lucas take an overnight trip to Hilton Head, S.C., to identify a body.
episodes.title: Crash Course in Polite Conversations

episodes.synopsis: On their way to drive Karen home from the airport, Keith and Lucas collide with an oncoming vehicle.
episodes.title: Hanging by a Moment

episodes.synopsis: While holding a vigil at Lucas's bedside as he lays in a coma, Karen meets Brooke, who is now dating Lucas.
episodes.title: I Shall Believe

episodes.synopsis: After his near-death experience, Lucas decides he made the wrong choice in girlfriends.
episodes.title: Suddenly Everything Has Changed

episodes.synopsis: Nathan must choose which parent to live with after Dan and Deb's divorce.
episodes.title: The First Cut is the Deepest

episodes.synopsis: The gang hits the road to Charlotte, N.C., for a basketball game and an annual cheerleading competition that squad leader Brooke is determined to win.
episodes.title: Spirit in the Night

episodes.synopsis: Lucas, Nathan and the rest of the Raven basketball players are auctioned off to the highest bidder in the annual "Boy Toy" charity auction.
episodes.title: To Wish Impossible Things

episodes.synopsis: Lucas must make a difficult decision regarding Brooke. Haley considers having sex with Nathan. Keith wants more from his relationship with Karen.
episodes.title: How Can You be Sure?

episodes.synopsis: While Nathan looks for a job to pay his rent, Haley hosts a party at his apartment -- but she panics when the situation gets out of control.
episodes.title: What is and What Should Never Be

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is shocked to learn that Dan once asked Karen for joint custody of him when he was a baby.
episodes.title: The Leaving Song

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Nathan bear the brunt of Dan's abuse as he coaches them into the playoffs, pushing both of them to their emotional breaking points.
episodes.title: The Games that Play Us

episodes.synopsis: At the hospital bed where Dan lies after a heart attack, Deb contemplates her role in the tragedy -- Dan had found Deb making love to Keith.
episodes.title: The Desperate Kingdom of Love

episodes.synopsis: With the assistance of Peyton and Brooke, Lucas gives Nathan and Haley a wedding reception.
episodes.title: The Truth Doesn't Make a Noise

episodes.synopsis: Although Nathan and Haley are already married, Tim insists on giving Nathan a bachelor party, while Brooke hosts Haley's bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Near Wild Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Brooke's smug new male neighbor rescues her after she is arrested for shoplifting. Nathan and Haley have their first post-wedding argument.
episodes.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want

episodes.synopsis: Felix organizes a "dare night" to test the limits of his new classmates. While out playing the game, Lucas meets a mysterious girl, Anna.
episodes.title: I Will Dare

episodes.synopsis: After "dare night" resulted in new relationships, Lucas shares a romantic evening with Anna during a midnight meteor shower.
episodes.title: We Might as Well Be Strangers

episodes.synopsis: The opening of Karen's club, TRIC, brings the people of Tree Hill together. Lucas and Felix engage in an altercation over Anna.
episodes.title: Let the Reigns go Loose

episodes.synopsis: Brooke, Peyton, Haley and Anna have a slumber party at Haley's apartment, where secrets and lies are revealed.
episodes.title: Truth, Bitter Truth

episodes.synopsis: Although Lucas takes Anna as his date to the Tree Hill High formal, he's with Brooke at the end of the night.
episodes.title: The Trick is to Keep Breathing

episodes.synopsis: Concerned about his brother's health, Nathan informs Karen that Lucas did not take the medical test for his heart.
episodes.title: Don't Take Me for Granted

episodes.synopsis: Haley is surprised when her older sister Taylor comes to town -- but not as shocked as Nathan, who recognizes Taylor from a past tryst.
episodes.title: The Heart Brings You Back

episodes.synopsis: Nathan confesses his past relationship with Taylor to Haley, but Haley continues to keep her emails with Chris a secret.
episodes.title: Between Order and Randomness

episodes.synopsis: After Lucas receives his medical test results, he moves in with Dan, straining his relationships with both Karen and Nathan.
episodes.title: The Hero Dies in this One

episodes.synopsis: Nathan experiences an emotional crisis and reverts to his former self as his marriage with Haley unravels.
episodes.title: Quiet Things that no one ever Knows

episodes.synopsis: During the creation of Tree Hill High's time capsule project, Anna and the members of the group confess their most intimate secrets to a video camera.
episodes.title: Unopened Letters to the World

episodes.synopsis: It's the wedding day for Keith and Jules, and the event has caused a commotion in the town.
episodes.title: Somewhere a Clock is Ticking

episodes.synopsis: Keith has a violent confrontation with Dan after learning that Dan paid Jules to have an affair with Keith.
episodes.title: Something I can Never Have

episodes.synopsis: On his way home from seeing Haley on tour, Nathan spends time with Taylor, hoping for some fun and maybe more.
episodes.title: The Lonesome Road

episodes.synopsis: Nathan's Uncle Cooper visits Tree Hill to take Nathan and Lucas on an auto racing trip.
episodes.title: I'm Wide Awake, It's Morning

episodes.synopsis: Lying in a coma after his racing accident, Nathan dreams of how life would have gone if Dan had stayed with Karen and Lucas instead of marrying Deb.
episodes.title: Lifetime Piling Up

episodes.synopsis: Nathan is discharged from the hospital and returns home to a pile of unpaid bills and an eviction notice.
episodes.title: What Could Have Been

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Brooke's relationship becomes more intimate when they travel to New York for an overnight stay with Haley.
episodes.title: The Tide that Left and Never Came Back

episodes.synopsis: As things heat up between Lucas and Brooke, Nathan and Deb decide they've had it with Dan and plan to break away from him for good.
episodes.title: The Leavers Dance

episodes.synopsis: After spending the summer out of town, Brooke returns to Tree Hill. Lucas welcomes his mother at the airport.
episodes.title: Like You Like an Arsonist

episodes.synopsis: Brooke organizes a beach party to celebrate the end of summer but soon finds she's the only one in a party mood.
episodes.title: From the Edge of the Deep Green Sea

episodes.synopsis: On the first day of senior year, estranged spouses Nathan and Haley have trouble adjusting as classmates.
episodes.title: First Day on a Brand New Planet

episodes.synopsis: It's party time in Tree Hill. A masquerade ball at the club Tric provides the perfect opportunity for Haley to win back Nathan's heart.
episodes.title: An Attempt to Tip the Scales

episodes.synopsis: The Ravens officially begin basketball practice -- with explosive results. Nathan, the new team captain, clashes with Lucas over Haley.
episodes.title: A Multitude of Casualties

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to keep her cheerleaders from fighting over the same guys, Brooke devises a "Fantasy Boy Draft."
episodes.title: Locked Hearts and Hand Grenades

episodes.synopsis: As the fantasy draft dates begin, Brooke finds herself on an unusual double date, while Lucas gets closer to Rachel.
episodes.title: Champagne for My Real Friends, Real Pain for My Sham Friends

episodes.synopsis: As the town readies for the Ravens' first basketball game, Lucas worries about his lack of commitment to basketball.
episodes.title: The Worst Day Since Yesterday

episodes.synopsis: Lucas reveals that he knows who tried to kill Dan. Brooke, Peyton and Haley find themselves behind bars.
episodes.title: How a Resurrection Really Feels

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Peyton take a road trip together to find Ellie. While out of town, Lucas reconnects with a friend from his past.
episodes.title: Brave New World

episodes.synopsis: After losing a game, the Ravens receive tough love from Whitey. Peyton and Ellie try to recruit rock band Nada Surf for their benefit album.
episodes.title: Return of the Future

episodes.synopsis: When a guidance counselor challenges the students of Tree Hill to consider their future, Nathan and Lucas feel pressure to impress a basketball scout.
episodes.title: I've Got Dreams to Remember

episodes.synopsis: A violent rainstorm knocks out the power in Tree Hill, leading Haley to Nathan's doorstep and Brooke to a dramatic confrontation with Lucas.
episodes.title: The Wind that Blew My Heart Away

episodes.synopsis: Brooke must grow up in a hurry when her trip to a New York City fashion show prevents her from attending an annual cheerleading tournament.
episodes.title: All Tomorrow's Parties

episodes.synopsis: When someone reveals the contents of the students' time capsule, Lucas and Mouth must confront a person from their past.
episodes.title: Just Watch the Fireworks

episodes.synopsis: A normal day turns deadly when a despondent student brings a gun to Tree Hill High. Nathan and Lucas put themselves at risk to protect their friends.
episodes.title: With Tired Eyes, Tired Minds, Tired Souls, We Slept

episodes.synopsis: The aftermath of the school shooting forces the residents of Tree Hill to examine their lives.
episodes.title: Who Will Survive and What Will Be Left of Them

episodes.synopsis: Rachel invites the gang to her family's cabin for a weekend getaway.
episodes.title: When It Isn't Like It Should Be

episodes.synopsis: Lucas struggles with whether or not he should play basketball now that Keith is dead. Brooke forces Rachel to deal with a dark secret.
episodes.title: I Slept with Someone in Fall Out Boy and All I Got Was This Stupid Song Written About Me

episodes.synopsis: It's the Coastal Classic basketball game, and with Lucas sidelined, Nathan has to step up against an old rival who shows an interest in Haley.
episodes.title: Everyday is a Sunday Evening

episodes.synopsis: On the night before Nathan and Haley's wedding, Brooke argues with Haley over the wedding dress. Meanwhile, Lucas and Karen return to Tree Hill.
episodes.title: Over the Hills and Far Away

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Nathan worries for Haley's safety, and Peyton and Brooke's friendship is tested prior to the wedding.
episodes.title: The Show Must Go On

episodes.synopsis: Brooke confronts Lucas with her true feelings, and Peyton makes a startling discovery.
episodes.title: The Same Deep Water as You

episodes.synopsis: Brooke celebrates her 18th birthday but finds it diminished by her struggles with Peyton.
episodes.title: Things I Forgot at Birth

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Brooke, now broken up, clash at a postgame party, and Haley realizes that Rachel is plotting to seduce Nathan.
episodes.title: Good News for People Who Love Bad News

episodes.synopsis: Peyton introduces hip-hop artist Lupe Fiasco at the nightclub Tric, while rumors that Brooke is pregnant run rampant.
episodes.title: Can't Stop This Thing We Started

episodes.synopsis: When Lucas discovers that newcomer Derek's interest in Peyton is more than brotherly, Derek becomes menacing.
episodes.title: I Love You but I've Chosen Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Nathan approaches Dan for help with his and Haley's finances. Despite his heart condition, Lucas rejoins the Ravens, teaming with Skills.
episodes.title: Where Did You Sleep Last Night

episodes.synopsis: Brooke copes with the T.A.R.T. fashion show and a new boyfriend. Rachel makes the cover of Maxim magazine.
episodes.title: All These Things That I've Done

episodes.synopsis: Derek convinces Peyton to take a chance with Lucas, but Brooke is approaching Lucas about getting back together.
episodes.title: Nothing Left To Say but Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: As Whitey's last game approaches, the residents of Tree Hill feel the pressure of a looming state championship showdown.
episodes.title: Some You Give Away

episodes.synopsis: The lives of Haley and her unborn child are threatened when she experiences serious complications with her pregnancy.
episodes.title: Songs to Love and Die By

episodes.synopsis: Following his heart attack, Lucas returns to school, hoping to rekindle his romance with Peyton.
episodes.title: Everything in its Right Place

episodes.synopsis: With senior prom only weeks away, Haley's frustration over her injuries increases.
episodes.title: Resolve

episodes.synopsis: A class assignment reveals the deepest secrets and desires of Lucas and the students of Tree Hill High.
episodes.title: Pictures of You

episodes.synopsis: Haley confronts Brooke regarding the stolen calculus test. Meanwhile, Lucas and Peyton consider taking their relationship to the next level.
episodes.title: Sad Songs for Dirty Lovers

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the prom, everyone in Tree Hill experiences the repercussions of Nathan's pre-prom party.
episodes.title: Prom Night at Hater High

episodes.synopsis: Lucas discovers who was in the hallway when his uncle was killed. Meanwhile, Peyton's decision not to attend the prom leads to dire consequences.
episodes.title: You Call it Madness, but I Call It Love

episodes.synopsis: The teens of Tree Hill mount a rescue mission to save Mouth from his ill-advised road trip with Rachel.
episodes.title: It Gets The Worst at Night

episodes.synopsis: Nathan fears for his future as past mistakes come back to haunt him and Haley.
episodes.title: The Runaway Found

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Haley grow closer, despite the recent scandal. Brooke wonders if a spark might be rekindled with Chase. Peyton receives a tempting offer.
episodes.title: Ashes of Dreams You Let Die

episodes.synopsis: As graduation day at Tree Hill finally arrives, Brooke's guilty conscience prompts her to make an important decision.
episodes.title: The Birth and Death of the Day

episodes.synopsis: The Tree Hill High School graduates share their bittersweet final moments together.
episodes.title: All of a Sudden I Miss Everyone

episodes.synopsis: Tree Hill is a new place. It's been four years since the gang left -- but in many ways, their real-world journey is just beginning.
episodes.title: 4 Years, 6 Months, 2 Days

episodes.synopsis: Lucas discovers the demands of coaching the Ravens, and Haley hires a nanny. Meanwhile, Jamie and Skills set their sights on a soap-box derby.
episodes.title: Racing Like a Pro

episodes.synopsis: Unbeknownst to Lucas, Nathan visits Dan in prison. Meanwhile, Haley urges problem student Quentin to return to school.
episodes.title: My Way Home Is Through You

episodes.synopsis: The gang's struggles at work continue to escalate, and Haley finds herself back in the recording studio.
episodes.title: It's Alright Ma (I'm Only Bleeding)

episodes.synopsis: In an episode set three years in the past, characters grapple with decisions that continue to affect their lives in the present.
episodes.title: I Forgot to Remember to Forget

episodes.synopsis: Confrontations abound in Tree Hill.
episodes.title: Don't Dream It's Over

episodes.synopsis: It's a Tree Hill reunion as the entire gang gathers at Tric to see a performance by musical group the Honorary Title.
episodes.title: In da Club

episodes.synopsis: The gang struggles to redefine some changing relationships.
episodes.title: Please, Please, Please, Let Me Get What I Want

episodes.synopsis: At the first Ravens basketball game of the season, Haley, Brooke, Peyton, Lindsey and Mia find themselves locked in the Tree Hill library.
episodes.title: For Tonight You're Only Here to Know

episodes.synopsis: When Brooke takes Owen to New York City for a glimpse of her other life, she runs into a ghost from her past.
episodes.title: Running to Stand Still

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of their wedding, Lucas and Lindsey conspire to save Nathan and Haley's marriage.
episodes.title: You're Gonna Need Someone on Your Side

episodes.synopsis: As Lucas and Lindsey's wedding day dawns, Peyton must decide whether to intervene or lose her true love forever.
episodes.title: Hundred

episodes.synopsis: Lucas picks up the pieces after Lindsey jilts him at the altar, while Nathan and Haley deal with the repercussions of Jamie's abduction.
episodes.title: Echoes, Silence, Patience, and Grace

episodes.synopsis: Peyton and Lucas finally discuss his aborted wedding.
episodes.title: What Do You Go Home To?

episodes.synopsis: Lindsey returns for Jamie's fifth birthday party, giving Lucas hope for their relationship. Meanwhile, Dan divulges a momentous secret.
episodes.title: Life Is Short

episodes.synopsis: Lucas looks into Dan's illness, Nathan urges Quentin to reinvent his game, Brooke copes with motherhood, and Mouth gets a shot as a sports anchor.
episodes.title: Cryin' Won't Help You Now

episodes.synopsis: Lucas receives devastating news, and Brooke's baby needs surgery. Meanwhile, Skills and Nathan employ a risky plan to salvage the Ravens' season.
episodes.title: Hate Is Safer Than Love

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, Brooke grapples with giving up her baby, and Lucas faces the repercussions of his game-night fight.
episodes.title: What Comes After the Blues

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 6 premiere, the girl of Lucas's dreams shows up at the airport. Plus, Nathan's comeback is halted by news that could change his career.
episodes.title: Touch Me I'm Going to Scream: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and his fiancée plan their wedding; Brooke and Peyton reconnect; Jamie sees Skills and Deb kissing; Nathan works on Quentin's basketball skills.
episodes.title: One Million Billionth of a Millisecond on a Sunday Morning

episodes.synopsis: Lucas returns from Vegas to face a tragedy as Nathan and Haley struggle to find a way to help Jamie understand the death of someone close to them.
episodes.title: Get Cape. Wear Cape. Fly

episodes.synopsis: Peyton is surprised when a famous musician visits her studio; Brooke confronts an old demon from her past.
episodes.title: Bridge Over Troubled Water

episodes.synopsis: Haley learns the truth about Dan, which leads to a final showdown with Nanny Carrie.
episodes.title: You've Dug Your Own Grave, Now Lie In It

episodes.synopsis: Lucas is joined by a familiar face as he begins his second book tour, and Peyton and Mick have a confrontation over his identity.
episodes.title: Choosing My Own Way of Life

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Haley must parent Jamie about facing a school bully, and Lucas and Peyton adjust to life as a couple and living together.
episodes.title: Messin' with the Kid

episodes.synopsis: Lucas's novel receives great interest; Mouth receives interest also, from his new intern; Jamie is enamored of Sam and her rebellious facade.
episodes.title: Our Life is Not a Movie or Maybe

episodes.synopsis: Nathan finds himself face-to-face with an old rival; Brooke deals with someone who once hurt her; Lucas's novel leads him into unchartered waters.
episodes.title: Sympathy for the Devil

episodes.synopsis: There's tension at Peyton's USO show as Lucas deals with Peyton and Julian's romantic past. Angels and Airwaves performs.
episodes.title: Even Fairy Tale Characters Would Be Jealous

episodes.synopsis: Chad Michael Murray pens a tribute to the classic films of the 1940s. Karen's Cafe is transformed into a glamorous nightclub with Lucas as proprietor.
episodes.title: We Three (My Echo, My Shadow and Me)

episodes.synopsis: Lucas goes to Hollywood; Nathan gets a basketball tryout; Peyton struggles with Mia about her album; Julian wants Brooke to design for his film.
episodes.title: You Have To Be Joking (Autopsy of the Devil's Brain)

episodes.synopsis: Peyton receives startling news she shares with Lucas. Brooke's search for Sam forces her to confront her feelings about the night she was attacked.
episodes.title: Things a Mama Don't Know

episodes.synopsis: As Peyton's news spreads, Mouth and Millicent struggle to remain a couple. Haley and Nathan spend a night out while Peyton and Lucas babysit Jamie.
episodes.title: A Hand to Take Hold of the Scene

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Julian try to choose a director for their movie. Peyton has mixed feelings about a gift and Brooke struggles with relationship issues.
episodes.title: We Change, We Wait

episodes.synopsis: Lucas tries to cast his movie while Peyton prepares for their wedding; Dan advises Jamie on a crush; Brooke meets the actress who will play her.
episodes.title: Screenwriter's Blues

episodes.synopsis: Peyton and Lucas get startling news about the pregnancy, and Brooke and Julian's relationship comes to a crossroads. Plus, Dan and Deb babysit Jamie.
episodes.title: You and Me and the Bottle Makes Three Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Lucas and Julian hit a setback with the film. Peyton and Haley help Mia with her new single. James Van Der Beek appears as Adam.
episodes.title: Searching for a Former Clarity

episodes.synopsis: Julian makes Brooke a startling offer; Lucas takes Nathan and Jamie to a key place from his past; Sam and Jack take a stand.
episodes.title: Letting Go

episodes.synopsis: When Peyton's pregnancy is threatened, Lucas struggles to pick up the pieces. Victoria tries to lure Brooke back to the business.
episodes.title: I Would For You

episodes.synopsis: Brooke discovers something that could change Sam's life. Plus, Haley receives an unexpected offer from guest star Nick Lachey.
episodes.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On

episodes.synopsis: Brooke and Haley throw Peyton a baby shower, while Sam grows closer to Victoria. Plus, Nathan learns NBA scouts will be at his next game.
episodes.title: Show Me How to Live

episodes.synopsis: Peyton and Lucas's wedding day has finally arrived. Haley plays an unexpected role in the ceremony and Brooke keeps guest star Nick Lachey on a leash.
episodes.title: Forever and Almost Always

episodes.synopsis: Nathan is released from the Chiefs; former star Moira Kelly pays Lucas and Peyton a visit; Brooke and Victoria prepare to relaunch Clothes over Bros.
episodes.title: Remember Me as a Time of Day

episodes.synopsis: Nathan learns of a shocking accusation, Brooke prepares to launch a new line, and Julian decides to produce a movie.
episodes.title: 4:30 AM (Apparently They Were Traveling Abroad)

episodes.synopsis: Mia helps Hayley protect Red Bedroom Records, and Clay defends Nathan against a growing scandal.
episodes.title: What Are You Willing to Lose

episodes.synopsis: Clay and Nathan disagree on how to handle a scandal, and Haley begins to question Nathan's loyalty. Alex makes Julian an interesting proposition.
episodes.title: Hold My Hand As I'm Lowered

episodes.synopsis: Nathan's scandal becomes public, and Brooke's fashion show brings a new responsibility for Millicent.
episodes.title: Believe Me, I'm Lying

episodes.synopsis: Haley is thrust into the storm of Nathan's scandal. Clay and Quinn grow closer, and Brooke questions Alex's motives.
episodes.title: Your Cheatin' Heart

episodes.synopsis: Julian gives Alex another chance, and Brooke reconnects with Chase. Meanwhile, Clay lets Quinn in on a big secret.
episodes.title: Deep Ocean Vast Sea

episodes.synopsis: Dan brings Renee onto his television show, leaving Nathan and Haley powerless to stop him from revealing the truth of her pregnancy to the world.
episodes.title: I and Love and You

episodes.synopsis: Julian agrees to a camping trip but struggles to fit in with Nathan and the guys. Meanwhile, Quinn helps Clay come to terms with a tragic loss.
episodes.title: I Just Died in Your Arms Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Haley returns to the stage, and Brooke receives life-changing news. Meanwhile, Dan returns to Tree Hill, much to the chagrin of Nathan.
episodes.title: Now You Lift Your Eyes to the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Nathan reaches the breaking point with Clay, and Brooke comes clean with Julian about her worries regarding his growing connection to Alex.
episodes.title: You Are a Runner and I Am My Father's Son

episodes.synopsis: Julian divulges a secret to Alex that leads to a confrontation with Brooke. Plus, Millie finds an unlikely supporter in Victoria.
episodes.title: You Know I Love You, Don't You

episodes.synopsis: As Nathan and Haley prepare for the family's move, Brooke struggles to accept Julian's reaction to Alex's crisis. Millie's downward spiral continues.
episodes.title: Some Roads Lead Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Jamie join Haley on tour, and Brooke and Julian reconnect after their six-week break.
episodes.title: Weeks Go By Like Days

episodes.synopsis: Clay helps Quinn through dinner with David and Haley. Julian sticks up for Alex on the set of their movie, and Brooke leans on Alexander.
episodes.title: Family Affair

episodes.synopsis: In an episode dedicated to the memory of the late writer-director John Hughes, chaos surrounds a 1980s-themed alumni dance at the high school.
episodes.title: Don't You Forget About Me

episodes.synopsis: Nathan and Haley receive a surprise visit, Clay supports Quinn as she faces unexpected news, and Alex sets her sights on Alexander.
episodes.title: My Attendance Is Bad but My Intentions Are Good

episodes.synopsis: Nathan tries to help Haley and Jamie confront Lydia's situation. Miranda tries to prove that she should produce Grubbs's album.
episodes.title: At the Bottom of Everything

episodes.synopsis: Brooke angrily deals with Alex's tryst with Julian, and Clay is forced to deal with Katie's unsettling advances.
episodes.title: The Last Day of Our Acquaintance

episodes.synopsis: On the eve of Quinn's gallery opening, an uninvited guest ambushes Clay. Meanwhile, Haley struggles with her mother's death.
episodes.title: Every Picture Tells a Story

episodes.synopsis: Alex discovers a secret about her leading man, Josh, that could derail Julian's film. Clay is confronted by an unstable Katie.
episodes.title: Learning to Fall

episodes.synopsis: Quinn leads Jamie on a treasure hunt. Julian shows his finished film to Brooke. Clay is forced to deal with a deranged Katie.
episodes.title: What's in the Ground Belongs to You

episodes.synopsis: Haley tries to overcome her depression by joining Nathan, Jamie and the rest of the gang on a trip to Utah for the premiere of Julian's film.
episodes.title: Almost Everything I Wish I'd Said the Last Time I Saw You

episodes.synopsis: Nathan prepares Jamie to be the man of the house while he's with his pro team.
episodes.title: Asleep at Heaven's Gate

episodes.synopsis: Clay and Quinn discover they've been shot, and as they fight to live, Nathan and Haley struggle with the situation.
episodes.title: I Can't See You, But I Know You're There

episodes.synopsis: In the hospital, Quinn is on the path to a full recovery, but Clayton's situation looks hopeless.
episodes.title: The Space in Between

episodes.synopsis: As Brooke deals with the mounting financial troubles at Clothes over Bros, Nathan and Haley come to a conclusion regarding Nathan's career.
episodes.title: We All Fall Down

episodes.synopsis: As Clay is discharged from the hospital, Nathan contemplates walking away from the NBA.
episodes.title: Nobody Taught Us to Quit

episodes.synopsis: As Halloween approaches in Tree Hill, Brooke and Julian get an unexpected visitor and Nathan begins a new career.
episodes.title: Not Afraid

episodes.synopsis: As the wedding approaches, Brooke tries to connect with Sylvia, while Julian looks for his best man at a guys' poker night.
episodes.title: Luck Be a Lady

episodes.synopsis: Nathan's career as an agent takes a big step forward when he visits Atlanta, while Haley consoles Jamie regarding his new braces.
episodes.title: Mouthful of Diamonds

episodes.synopsis: The gang gathers at Nathan and Haley's to spend Thanksgiving with friends and family.
episodes.title: Between Raising Hell and Amazing Grace

episodes.synopsis: Nathan goes back to college and opts to take a harder class, but he doesn't get a very welcoming reception from his college professor.
episodes.title: Lists, Plans

episodes.synopsis: A storm strikes Tree Hill, putting everyone's life in danger.
episodes.title: Darkness on the Edge of Town

episodes.synopsis: After a wild night out on the town for her bachelorette party, Brooke and the girls try to piece together what happened.
episodes.title: The Drinks We Drank Last Night

episodes.synopsis: Brooke and Julian's wedding day has finally arrived. Alex and Quinn have started to spend time together.
episodes.title: The Other Half of Me

episodes.synopsis: Brooke, Quinn and Haley decide to use their talents for the greater good. Meanwhile, Julian takes on a directing job.
episodes.title: Holding Out for a Hero

episodes.synopsis: Sex games, secrets and shoelaces all come into play as the couples of Tree Hill celebrate Valentine's Day.
episodes.title: Valentine's Day Is Over

episodes.synopsis: As the girls plan a surprise baby shower for Haley, the guys participate in tryouts for Jamie's baseball team.
episodes.title: I Think I'm Gonna Like It Here

episodes.synopsis: As Haley's due date approaches, she takes steps to ensure that all her friends and family will be ready when the time comes.
episodes.title: The Smoker You Drink, the Player You Get

episodes.synopsis: The big day has finally arrived, and the gang gathers at the hospital to await the birth of Haley and Nathan's baby.
episodes.title: Quiet Little Voices

episodes.synopsis: While Haley stays at home to take care of the new baby, Quinn organizes a concert. Meanwhile, Brooke gets an offer to return to Clothes over Bros.
episodes.title: Where Not to Look for Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Julian and Clay coach Jamie's first Little League game. Meanwhile, Chase asks Alex to take a drug test for him.
episodes.title: The Man Who Sailed Around His Soul

episodes.synopsis: Nathan, Jamie, Clay, Julian, Chase and Chuck have a campout on the Rivercourt. Meanwhile, Brooke, Quinn, Alex and Lauren take a trip to Puerto Rico.
episodes.title: Flightless Bird, American Mouth

episodes.synopsis: Haley and Brooke prepare to reopen Karen's Café, and Nathan and Clay travel in search of new clients.
episodes.title: This Is My House, This Is My Home

episodes.synopsis: In the ninth season premiere, the series welcomes new hopes, challenges and dangers -- and a few familiar faces.
episodes.title: Know This, We've Noticed

episodes.synopsis: Brooke discusses a new venture with her dad. Chris Keller makes Alex an offer she may not be able to refuse. Nathan volunteers to scout in Europe.
episodes.title: In the Room Where You Sleep

episodes.synopsis: Dan helps a struggling Haley at Karen's Cafe, Quinn discovers Clay is hiding something from her and Chase tries to mend a broken heart.
episodes.title: Love The Way You Lie

episodes.synopsis: Julian deals with his guilt. Brooke helps Haley confront a rival cafe. Quinn takes extreme measures to help Clay realize he's worse than he thought.
episodes.title: Don't You Want to Share The Guilt?

episodes.synopsis: Nathan is missing and Haley fears the worst. Clay gets answers about his condition. Brooke tries to give Tara a chance.
episodes.title: The Killing Moon

episodes.synopsis: Dan enlists Julian to help in his search for Nathan, and Haley explains the disappearance to Jamie. Chris Keller confronts Chase about Tara.
episodes.title: Catastrophe and the Cure

episodes.synopsis: Haley seeks help from Lucas. Brooke comes face-to-face with Xavier.
episodes.title: Last Known Surroundings

episodes.synopsis: Dan's search for Nathan leads him back to his dark past. Clay has a breakthrough in his treatment.
episodes.title: A Rush of Blood to the Head

episodes.synopsis: Chase faces consequences for defending Chuck. Clay reaches a new understanding with Logan. Haley partners with Dan in his search for Nathan.
episodes.title: Every Breath Is a Bomb

episodes.synopsis: Brooke's conflict with Xavier escalates.
episodes.title: Hardcore Will Never Die, But You Will

episodes.synopsis: Dan risks everything for Nathan. Brooke is surprised when her father returns. Clay and Quinn reconnect with Logan.
episodes.title: Danny Boy

episodes.synopsis: Clay and Quinn get ready for Logan's first night at the beach house, and Julian tries to breathe new life into a past idea.
episodes.title: Anyone Who Had a Heart

episodes.synopsis: It's the series finale: How will the saga end?
episodes.title: One Tree Hill
